actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 110-216.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain land in Clark County, Nevada, for use by the Nevada National Guard.

summary.text: Southern Nevada Readiness Center Act - Permits Clark County, Nevada, to convey between 35 and 50 acres of land in Clark County to the Nevada Division of State Lands for use by the Nevada National Guard.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain land in Clark County, Nevada, for use by the Nevada National Guard.
